pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiple and Heterogeneous Question-Answering (MuHeQA) system## Quick Start!Install the `muheqa` package:````pythonpip install muheqa````Create a new connection to Wikidata, or DBpedia, or D4C (Drugs4Covid). *The first time it may take a few minutes to download the required models*:````pythonimport muheqa.connector as mhqawikidata = mhqa.connect(wikidata=True)````And finally, make a question in natural language!:````pythonresponse = wikidata.query("Who is the father of Barack Obama")print("Response:",response)````
